data.what_is:
Manychat is the #1 omnichannel platform for D2C brands, Retail stores, Non-profits, Restaurants, Real Estate companies in the world. 

Founded in 2016, Manychat powers over 1 billion conversations every year and is used in over 190 countries. 

Engage your customers instantly. Automate interactive conversations in Instagram Direct Messages, Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp and SMS to grow your brand. Whether you are looking to generate more leads, automating your campaigns, or improving customer satisfaction by increasing your SLA times, Manychat has all the tools to solve your business's marketing needs. 

This is what Chat Marketing is and what Manychat is.
data.product_description: Manychat lets you create a Facebook Messenger bot for marketing, sales and support. It`s easy and freeSimply put we are the industry leaders in Chat Marketing. What sets us apart from the competitors is our engaging UX, engaged and loyal community and our overall approach to omnichannel marketing. While other platforms are considered "omnichannel", at our low starting price point, Manychat gives you the flexibility and ability to customize and organize your customer experience and get a completed view of all your conversations across all the platforms Manychat has!

initial_reviews.review_title: The Messenger ChatBot Every Business Needs
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
I've been using ManyChat for four years, and it has been fantastic for my business. It allows me to easily grow my online presence, communicate with prospects, and build our email list. The platform is user-friendly for both me and my clients. It offers impressive options for creating chatbots with media, external links, and now, with the new pro upgrade, we can generate leads by letting users submit their details. I highly recommend ManyChat for anyone looking to communicate effectively with customers and automate messages.

What do you dislike about Manychat?
I'm having trouble getting the pro version because my card keeps getting declined. Also, The features are limited, and the pro subsctiption price is too high.

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
ManyChat lets me automate messaging and build bots. This saves me time communicating with customers. It also helps me grow my audience and email list. The platform is easy to use with lots of options to customize my messaging flows. Overall, ManyChat streamlines my marketing and communication.

initial_reviews.review_title: An Invaluable Tool for Streamlining Communication: My Five-Year Journey with Manychat
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
I have been utilizing Manychat for an extensive five-year period, and it has consistently exceeded my expectations as a communication platform. There are several aspects of Manychat that I find exceptionally commendable. First and foremost, its user-friendly interface allows even those with minimal technical expertise to effortlessly create and deploy powerful chatbots. The drag-and-drop functionality makes it incredibly convenient to design conversational flows and automate various business processes. Manychat's integration capabilities with popular messaging platforms like Facebook Messenger have been an absolute game-changer for me, enabling me to reach and engage with my audience in a more personalized and efficient manner. Furthermore, the comprehensive analytics and reporting features provide invaluable insights into campaign performance, allowing me to refine and optimize my chatbot strategies effectively. Overall, I am impressed by Manychat's consistent dedication to empowering businesses through streamlined communication.

What do you dislike about Manychat?
While my experience with Manychat has been overwhelmingly positive, there are a few areas where I believe there is room for improvement. Firstly, the pricing structure could be more flexible, particularly for smaller businesses or individuals with limited budgets. Offering more affordable plans or additional pricing tiers would make it more accessible to a wider range of users. Additionally, although Manychat provides a wide range of pre-built templates, I have occasionally encountered limitations in customizing these templates to align precisely with my brand's unique voice and aesthetics. More flexibility in customizing templates or the ability to create chatbot designs from scratch would greatly enhance the platform's versatility. Lastly, while Manychat offers excellent customer support, there have been a few instances where I experienced delays in receiving assistance, which can be frustrating when facing urgent issues. Strengthening their support response time would undoubtedly enhance the overall user experience.

Despite these minor drawbacks, Manychat remains an essential tool for streamlining communication, boosting customer engagement, and driving business growth. Its intuitive interface, seamless integrations, and robust analytics make it an invaluable asset for any business seeking to leverage the power of chatbots effectively.

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
Manychat solves problems related to communication and marketing by automating customer interactions, enhancing lead generation and engagement, personalizing customer experiences, and providing comprehensive analytics. These solutions benefit me by improving efficiency, expanding my customer base, fostering stronger connections with my audience, and enabling data-driven decision-making. Overall, Manychat has significantly streamlined my communication processes and driven business success.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great except
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
Keywords, flow, automation, comment responses all great except

What do you dislike about Manychat?
I think it's okay that your service disables pro features when a subscription expires or there's a payment issue, but this is the first time I've used a software service that keeps pro features disabled even after restoring the payment! My store Seek Shine (https://manychat.com/fb365177/dashboard) was disabled last July 2022 because of a problem with my card but I immediately resolved it. How was I supposed to know that I had to turn all of my keywords and flows back on??? That's such a poor user experience! As for my other store CLN (https://manychat.com/fb141662582646965/cms/), I checked back now and it expired for some reason on December 22. It's still on the PRO plan with all keywords and flows turned off as well. initial_reviews.review_title: It's a well-structured bot development platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
I started developing chatbot in 2018. At that time, ManyChat (and in fact all chatbot development platforms) were at the beginning, with many errors and quite a few facilities.

Then, in the need to integrate as many software applications as possible, I worked for 1 year on ChatFuel.

But, after ManyChat integrated dynamically integrated request, it convinced me to switch all my clients to this platform.

What do you dislike about Manychat?
Well, I don't dislike anything. It's ok and I can do my job well for my clients.
Maybe just the setting up of ADS campaigns where it's still not friendly enough for advanced marketing.

Recommendations to others considering Manychat:
I recommend ManyChat for the ease with which it can be learned.

Also, flows can be tracked very easily, and that means more clarity and goals met.

First of all, it is easy to learn from the FREE course on the official website.

Then I highly recommend reading the case studies on the official blog.

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
With ManyChat I managed to integrate many of the applications often used by my clients: FB Live, CRM, webinars, Email-Marketing, SMS Marketing.

I managed to solve the complex problems that appear in attracting leads and in the customer-care area.

all_reviews.review_title: An Invaluable Tool for Streamlining Communication: My Five-Year Journey with Manychat
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
I have been utilizing Manychat for an extensive five-year period, and it has consistently exceeded my expectations as a communication platform. There are several aspects of Manychat that I find exceptionally commendable. First and foremost, its user-friendly interface allows even those with minimal technical expertise to effortlessly create and deploy powerful chatbots. The drag-and-drop functionality makes it incredibly convenient to design conversational flows and automate various business processes. Manychat's integration capabilities with popular messaging platforms like Facebook Messenger have been an absolute game-changer for me, enabling me to reach and engage with my audience in a more personalized and efficient manner. Furthermore, the comprehensive analytics and reporting features provide invaluable insights into campaign performance, allowing me to refine and optimize my chatbot strategies effectively. Overall, I am impressed by Manychat's consistent dedication to empowering businesses through streamlined communication.

What do you dislike about Manychat?
While my experience with Manychat has been overwhelmingly positive, there are a few areas where I believe there is room for improvement. Firstly, the pricing structure could be more flexible, particularly for smaller businesses or individuals with limited budgets. Offering more affordable plans or additional pricing tiers would make it more accessible to a wider range of users. Additionally, although Manychat provides a wide range of pre-built templates, I have occasionally encountered limitations in customizing these templates to align precisely with my brand's unique voice and aesthetics. More flexibility in customizing templates or the ability to create chatbot designs from scratch would greatly enhance the platform's versatility. Lastly, while Manychat offers excellent customer support, there have been a few instances where I experienced delays in receiving assistance, which can be frustrating when facing urgent issues. Strengthening their support response time would undoubtedly enhance the overall user experience.

Despite these minor drawbacks, Manychat remains an essential tool for streamlining communication, boosting customer engagement, and driving business growth. Its intuitive interface, seamless integrations, and robust analytics make it an invaluable asset for any business seeking to leverage the power of chatbots effectively.

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
Manychat solves problems related to communication and marketing by automating customer interactions, enhancing lead generation and engagement, personalizing customer experiences, and providing comprehensive analytics. These solutions benefit me by improving efficiency, expanding my customer base, fostering stronger connections with my audience, and enabling data-driven decision-making. Overall, Manychat has significantly streamlined my communication processes and driven business success.

all_reviews.review_title: Great except
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
Keywords, flow, automation, comment responses all great except

What do you dislike about Manychat?
I think it's okay that your service disables pro features when a subscription expires or there's a payment issue, but this is the first time I've used a software service that keeps pro features disabled even after restoring the payment! My store Seek Shine (https://manychat.com/fb365177/dashboard) was disabled last July 2022 because of a problem with my card but I immediately resolved it. How was I supposed to know that I had to turn all of my keywords and flows back on??? That's such a poor user experience! As for my other store CLN (https://manychat.com/fb141662582646965/cms/), I checked back now and it expired for some reason on December 22. It's still on the PRO plan with all keywords and flows turned off as well. That means I've been paying $200+ for Seek Shine for the last 10 months and $500+ per month for CLN for the last 5 months with absolutely NONE of the PRO features enabled. That's just absolutely absurd. PLEASE give me a refund for these months because I was essentially paying the PRO plan (totaling $4500) for NOTHING! Your software practice is borderline fraudulent. If you automatically turn off pro features when the subscription terminates then you should also automatically turn them back on when the subscription resumes!

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
Repetitive questions

all_reviews.review_title: It's a well-structured bot development platform
all_reviews.review_content:

all_reviews.review_title: Review of Manychat by Chatbot Developer
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
The best part about Manychat is its very convenient and user-friendly chatbot flow builder. Also, it provides direct and seamless integration to Facebook messenger. It also allows the developer to test the chatbot before deployment. It's one of the most advanced platforms for rule-based chatbots with a lot of useful functionalities. Its growth tools such as short links and comment growth tools makes it really useful for marketers. It can also be integrated with the Facebook Ad Campaign to make complete use of it. It also allows us t to connect to external APIs using custom webhook calls. Using this feature we can call any rest API such as GET, POST, etc. It also has a template section where we can create and manage flows in the form of tempaltes.

What do you dislike about Manychat?
The things that I dislike about manychat are that it lacks a good amount of integrations that are available on other similar platforms. It can have more integrations suck as Slack, Websites, Whatsapp, etc. Also, it lacks an inbuilt support for NLP for making AI-based Chatbots.

Recommendations to others considering Manychat:
Use it only for rule-based simple chatbots.

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are solving the problem of designing chatbots without writing any code and that too in very less time. With a platform like Manychat we can easily create, build and deploy a chatbot to a Facebook page within no time.

all_reviews.review_title: Features don't work and support are unwilling to assist.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
Fantastic UI and very easy to understand.

What do you dislike about Manychat?
The primary feature to reach your list is 'Paid Messages' - the only way offered to contact the people in your 'list' - asides from 'messenger tags' which don't apply to the majority of companies.

Unfortunately, when we use Paid Messages, we only reach 20-30% of our total contacts. We queried this with our Facebook Ads contact and they stated that despite the list being uploaded containing over 5,000+ contacts, they could only match the information with 1,500 contacts.

When I contacted ManyChat for a potential solution, they refused to offer support and said "Unfortunately, I can't provide that info to you, as we don't have enough insight into the Facebook Ads Manager processes. Please, make sure to address it to Facebook support."

We will likely have to involve legal services due to the lack of support. We have no access to the information being uploaded to Facebook, no access to OUR contacts. Yet we are charged each week for the services of building a list that we can never use.

Recommendations to others considering Manychat:
I would look for services that offer better support. Unfortunately, there is limited availability. MobileMonkey is an inferior product but perhaps a better option given the lack of support.

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
Still attempting to get some support. Disappointing to have built such a large list only to find that there is no way to contact them. We've spent thousands and it appears to be to no benefit.

all_reviews.review_title: Manychat is the most user friendly tool to build Chatbots.  Period.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
The flow building tool is so initiative.  The ability to use pick-whips and click to add elements in a non-linear fashion allows a user to take complex designs and build quickly.  The Google Sheet plugins has multiple ways to both push or pull data which allows for you to keep data in an external tool. The fact that you can do all of this without coding is amazing.

What do you dislike about Manychat?
The conditional blocks could use a bit UX work.  The view of conditional blocks in the flow builder is good, but the side-bar options are a bit clunky and doesn't pre-populate with already created values.  It would also be valuable to be able to send data out of Manychat more easily for analytic purposes.  No ability to download .csv data is a bit painful.  This means any data you want has to use Google Sheets.  Not great multi-language support.  Also our target is focused in Myanmar and so SMS is not supported.

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
Manychat helps us build chatbot solutions for Financial Literacy in Southeast Asia where where a fast growing percentage of new users are leapfrogging traditional technologies and going strait to chat and facebook messenger.  Manychat allows us to quickly spin up solutions for educating users in our market without needing the typical long tech build cycle.  We also are meeting our users where they already are which is Facebook.

all_reviews.review_title: Great interface and results using Manychat
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
The support is very good and interface makes it easy to work out what you need to do to get to the next step.  Flows are easy to build on the fly and when you test them they work really nicely straightaway.
From a marketing perspective one of the key features I really like would have to be the ability to segment an audience using features like the tags and custom fields.

What do you dislike about Manychat?
Occasionally I have noticed when I go into a flow to edit the flow is a little blurred and I am having to reset or restart Manychat to fix it.  It's a minor frustration to be honest.

Recommendations to others considering Manychat:
I would say that because it is either free or very cheap it is worth giving a go.  It is really easy to build a basic bot or find help if you need something more complex putting together.   I would also say it is a good idea to learn if you either own or are planning to won a marketing agency given that marketing is going down the path of facebook messenger and there do not appear to be too many experts in this space yet.

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
One problem is that a lot of businesses are not set up to immediately answer online queries via a Fb page or website.  A chatbot set up in Manychat provides the ability to answer a customers query straightaway in a way a human may not be able.  Immediately responding increases the chance that the customer will act to book an appointment or even make sale.

all_reviews.review_title: Building a chatbot that can last forever
Revolutionary Product, Fantastic Team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
The ManyChat platform has been a revolutionary asset in assisting our clients' businesses both in sales and support. Our team has been has thoroughly enjoyed developing chatbots on their platform and have done so for 50+ brands to date. The rate at which they deploy new features and capabilities into the software is staggering, and they are constantly listening to the feedback of the ManyChat community to continually improve and enhance the product even further. What more could you ask for? We're incredibly happy with the decision we made over two years ago to move forward with their platform!

What do you dislike about Manychat?
We've encountered some specific browser-based issues that required us to switch browsers to more effectively develop our chatbot flows, but these weren't too significant. Overall, there are very few things about the platforms that we dislike and most of them haven't been too problematic for our digital agency.

Recommendations to others considering Manychat:
I have tried other Facebook-oriented chatbot software and I can confidently say that ManyChat has a solid leg up on the competition, and they are constantly taking measures to stay ahead of market shifts to ensure the best experience and functionality for the clients on their platform. Their support team is phenomenal, and their development team are rockstars, constantly listening to the needs and requests of the community in consideration of new features and fixes. I can't say enough about how pleased we are about their platform!

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have helped many clients create highly-effective and engaging top-of-funnel customer acquisition experiences that have resulted in tremendous increases in sales and the overall bottom line for their businesses. In addition to the sales side, we have helped other clients automate their customer service and reduce live support needs dramatically. For others, we've created highly-personalized conversational flows that build brand trust and loyalty and at the same time capture valuable information on each new prospect entering their chat experience. And for almost all of our customers, we've been able to leverage Zapier to build in some highly effective marketing automation.

all_reviews.review_title: Bot Implementation is super easy
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
The amount of options when creating a bot is super impressive. We are able to use Manychat to generate the exact flow the clients want, from including media, to external weblinks and with the new pro upgrade, we are also able to generate leads by letting the users submit their details when they are interested and want to take it to the next level.

What do you dislike about Manychat?
Not many things i dislike about Manychat. It can get a bit confusing as to which bot you are editing but apart from that, everything is laid out nicely.

Recommendations to others considering Manychat:
Just go for it. If your business loves to automate or your clients are easily impressed then this is the way to go. We are able to generate leads, and also in busy environments where a human can't man messenger 24/7, the bot is able to take over and filter through real buyers compared to those who are time wasters. Our clients are super impressed with the amount of leads this generates and are able to focus on what they do best, selling.

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
Time and Effort. Facebook bots are very simple, but require a large amount of time editing, and coding it for specific responses. When we are working with clients who require complex flows, Manychat is able to break that down for us significantly. We can jump in, create a bot within hours, and show the client the flow and map of the bot.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to use and so many customizable options!
Automated FB Messenger Goodness
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
Tough question. ManyChat is an outstanding tool for building automated Facebook Messenger bots for pages. Narrowing it down to one thing is a challenge but I will say that the ease of which you can build out a chat "flow" on the platform is great. You can do a lot on the platform for absolutely free which is a huge bonus. There are also, integrations with Google Docs, Email marketing and more that make software a true asset for Facebook marketing.

What do you dislike about Manychat?
Ok, I've run into this recently. If you have a bot set up that someone responds to and you also have an automated welcome message as far as I know you can not disable the welcome message. So that means that if the user comments again in Messenger after the initial chat bot conversation, it will automatically fire off messages that are probably not relevant. Even if you send a manual message them first and then the user replies the welcome message fires.

Recommendations to others considering Manychat:
If you are looking into using ManyChat, check out the training provided by Mackenise Liberman. She is a a true expert and has a lot of great training and knowledge to share.

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm solving the problem of not being able to be everywhere at all times. There are some basic questions that many people will ask and a ManyChat bot will help answer those. In addition, I'm running ad campaign that are driven through the bots which allows for seamless gathering of pertinent information

all_reviews.review_title: The Good Bot Every Business Needs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
I've been using ManyChat for just over a year now and love the ability it gives me to grow my online presence, communicates with my prospects and grows our email list.

My favourite features at present are the Facebook comment growth tool which helps me to deliver our digital freebies in an away that doesn't require our audience to have to visit a landing page to get the good stuff.

We have been able to use the bot to grow our list within our Facebook group, website and blog post to name a few.

What do you dislike about Manychat?
The fabulous free training ManyChat provides is great but very overwhelming and a lot to do so at times you miss out on the important tech know-how because you may have overlooked it. Wished it was broken down into sections that were simply called 'The Tech Stuff - How to'.

I dislike how the path of a conversation looks, found it confusing and at times made me want to restart all over again. Found it difficult to also connect the flow when going back to make edits and wished it was much clearer.

Recommendations to others considering Manychat:
I would love if they could offer templates that were specific to particular industries such as fitness, social media agencies and health and beauty companies. This would help newbies to create effective bot conversation paths and know what the right things to say.

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps us to grow our email list, generate more engagement on our Facebook posts and thus improving our organic reach. It's also a great customer service tool to help connect and offer the best service to our customers even when we're away from our desks.

all_reviews.review_title: Very good Messenger chatbot
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
It does what it needs to do and it's free, which is amazing. I can very easily send messages for my  company's bot subscribers, I can segment these messages, I can create sequences, and there are analytics reports for me to analyze in order to measure the performance of the messages I send with this. Great value for money, I really recommend this, especially if you work at a startup like me.

What do you dislike about Manychat?
Well that's a tough one... For a free product it's got everything I need at the moment.  No complaints here. I mean, I don't love the branding, but it's a Fremium service, so can't complain about that. I really like this chatbot service.

Recommendations to others considering Manychat:
You want a Messenger chatbot that's good value for money? This is pretty good. I work at a startup so we have a small budget and Manychat is great for this situation.

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's another way to keep in touch with some customers in a way that pretty much guarantees they'll read the message I send. You don't get this with most channels at your disposal to communicate with your audience.

all_reviews.review_title: The product has potential but the customer service is absolutely horrible.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Manychat?
It has a lot of options. I needed it to quickly create a bot for responding to leads. Chatfuel was easier to use but Manychat had a pricing model that fitted my needs better.

What do you dislike about Manychat?
As opposed to Chatfuel which was so easy to use, I found Manychat extremely complicated to create bots with. Maybe it was like this for me since I was used to Chatfuel, but I just couldn't figure out Manychat's 'Flows' options, despite reading their online material. I built several flows and published them but wasn't able to get my leads to trigger them.

The 'highlight' of it all was after I created a flow I wanted to later change and clicked the 'Revert to Published' button, thinking all my recent changes will be reverted. It completely deleted my entire work (not only the latest changes) and I couldn't reproduce it.

The worse thing was their customer service - I titled my ticket as urgent (I have huge marketing budgets bringing leads to this bot) but they responded over a week later. Then it became even more frustrating since they gave me numerous solutions which had NOTHING to do with my issue. They just couldn't understand what I'm talking about, suggesting that they themselves don't use their product.
Exhausted, I asked them to cancel my subscription. They did refund my money for that month, but a month later I found out they actually didn't cancel my subscription and kept on charging me! I went ahead and canceled my subscription myself, and there - surprise, surprise - found out that cancellation is only valid from the upcoming month. So you need to pay for another unused month.

This awful experience cost me time and money and only rewarded me back with frustration. Go with Chatfuel.

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
Creating bots quickly (allegedly)

I like their social tools for chatbots and their flow editor is an interesting way to organize chatbot management, but it can be a little clunky.

What do you dislike about Manychat?
I do not like their NLU support, and lack of ability to integrate third-party NLU product. I dislike that they limit what you can do with Facebook Messenger, as there are some features not available on the platform that Facebook supports. Companies do not own their customer data, so if/when they want to move away from Manychat they will lose data.

What problems is Manychat solving and how is that benefiting you?
Building PoC and demos. We built our first marketing chatbot with Manychat but ultimately moved to something custom.
